snippet: Sabas, known as the Cave Man of Inwood Hill Park, is one of New York's more unlikely sports fans.
abstract: Sabas, known as the Cave Man of Inwood Hill Park, is one of New York's more unlikely sports fans.
lead_paragraph: With the college and professional football seasons in their final stretch, and with the New York Giants continuing their unexpected playoff run, football fever is running high in the city.

headline.main: Shunning Modernity, Except When the Game Is On
